name: Italian Salsa Verde
keywords: Italian salsa verde, green sauce, condiment, parsley, basil, mint, capers, gherkins, anchovies, garlic, mustard, red wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh herbs, flavorful, easy recipe, quick, versatile, steak sauce, fish sauce, sandwich spread
description: A vibrant and incredibly flavorful Italian Salsa Verde, easily made with fresh herbs, capers, gherkins, and anchovies, perfect as a versatile condiment.

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients into a blender and blitz until the sauce reaches a chunky yet saucy consistency. Enjoy immediately!
recipeInstructions.name: Blitz

notes: This salsa verde can be stored fresh in the refrigerator or frozen in ice cube trays for later use.
It pairs wonderfully with grilled steak, salmon, and is also delicious on sandwiches or anywhere you desire a burst of fresh flavor!
